power.title: Dodge Step
power.fluff: Relying on superior balance and agility, you move in the blink of an eye

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy ends a move adjacent to you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift 1 square.

power.title: Incredible Balance
power.fluff: No matter how narrow the path, you have the balance and coordination needed to walk it

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move your speed -2. During this movement, you ignore difficult terrain, and you can move across any horizontal surface that is at least 3 inches wide without making an Acrobatics check.

power.title: Lockstep Maneuver
power.fluff: Your enemy moves, and you match its steps with a countermove

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy within 5 squares of you moves willingly

section.name: Effect:
section.text: For each square the triggering creature moves, you shift 1 square, to a maximum of one-half your speed.

power.title: Practiced Rider
power.fluff: So familiar are you with the saddle, you can spring to or from your mount in a flash

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You mount or dismount a willing, adjacent creature that has the Mount keyword.

power.title: Timely Dodge
power.fluff: Something out of the corner of your eye causes you to step out of the way of danger

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy targets you with a ranged, area or close attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift up to half your speed.
If the triggering attack is a ranged attack that only targeted you, the triggering enemy can choose a new target for the attack if you are now out of range.

power.title: Tumbling Dodge
power.fluff: You deftly tumble away from a strike

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A melee attack hits you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make an Acrobatics check, and gain a bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack equal to the check result divided by 10 (rounded down, minimum +1).
If the triggering attack misses you, you can shift 1 square, or shift 2 squares to a space that is not within the attacker's reach.

power.title: Demonic Bargain
power.fluff: You call on a demonic entity to wreak greater havoc, but tear a part of your mind in the process

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You roll damage and dislike the result

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You reroll the triggering damage, and use the second result.
After the triggering power has been resolved, you take psychic damage equal to twice the power's level. Any resist or immunity to psychic you might have does not apply to this damage.

power.title: Experienced Arcana
power.fluff: You have discovered how to perform your magic rituals with fewer alchemical reagents that other ritualists require

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have the Ritual Caster feat.

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You use this power as part of casting an Arcana ritual of one-half your level or lower

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You need to expend only half of the ritual's gold piece component cost, though any focus item must still meet the minimum cost. If the ritual has a healing surge cost, you can choose to reduce that by 1 (to a minimum of 0) instead of halving the gold piece cost.
If you make an Arcana check as part of the ritual and dislike the result, you can reroll the check with a +2 power bonus and use either result.

section.name: GM Note:
section.text: Still pondering if this should be allowed to be used with item creation rituals. Possibly going to push up the level and allow them.

power.title: Insightful Warning
power.fluff: As your foe unleashes its attack, you realize that you have read about this exact sort of danger and shout a warning to your friends

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A creature you can see makes an attack roll for an area or close attack that includes you as a target

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, and each ally in the burst that is targeted by the triggering attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack.

power.title: Peer Through the Void
power.fluff: You part the veil between worlds, seeing creatures from the Far Realm as they really are

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Peer Through the Void stance.

Until the stance ends, you gain blindsight 3, and aberrant creatures grant combat advantage to you. You take a -2 penalty to attack rolls and Perception checks against anything outside the range of your blindsight.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can end this stance as a free action on your turn, but not on the same turn you entered it.

power.title: Warp in the Weave
power.fluff: You spend energy and tap into the web of magic that connects everything, ready to create a hole

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A creature uses a burst or blast power that includes you in the area

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You spend a healing surge to create a hole in the triggering power. The hole causes the triggering power to not target you or your space.
You can spend two additional surges to increase the size of the hole, making the triggering power also not target squares adjacent to you and any creatures whose space fits into those squares.

power.title: Crushing Escape
power.fluff: You smash free from your enemy's grasp, sending it reeling and making it susceptible to your next attack

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You make an escape attempt using Athletics

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +4 power bonus to the triggering check.
If you escape, and a creature was grabbing you, that creature gains vulnerable 5 to your attacks until the end of your next turn.
If the grabbing creature is your size of smaller, you can choose to push it 1 square instead of shifting yourself.

power.title: Mighty Sprint
power.fluff: You throw yourself forward at a breakneck pace, bounding over obstacles

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move your speed +4. You gain a +5 power bonus to Athletics checks you make as part of the movement.

power.title: Practiced Force
power.fluff: Summoning all your training as well as your might, your effort exceeds what strength alone could gain

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You would make a Strength check.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You use your Athletics check modifier in place of your Strength check modifier for the triggering check.

power.title: Practiced Rider
power.fluff: So familiar are you with the saddle, you can spring to or from your mount in a flash

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You mount or dismount a willing, adjacent creature that has the Mount keyword.

power.title: Sudden Leap
power.fluff: You spring so quickly that an enemy has trouble following your movement

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose an enemy you can see, then make an Athletics check to long jump. You can never be consired to have a running start for this jump.
If your Athletics check result is equal to or higher than the chosen enemy's passive Perception, it cannot trigger actions based on this movement.

power.title: Conceal Psyche
power.fluff: You hide the core of your identity deep in your subconscious

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to Will, and a +4 power bonus to saving throws against Charm and Psychic effects.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can also use this power as a free interrupt with the following trigger and effect:

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You start your turn and are dominated

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make a saving throw against the dominating effect. If the effect normally allows a saving throw, you gain a +2 power bonus to this save.

power.title: Confusing Blather
power.fluff: You spew a stream of nonsense, leaving your enemies puzzled

section.name: Check:
section.text: Bluff vs. Passive Insight

section.name: Success:
section.text: The target cannot make reactive strikes against you until the end of your next turn.

power.section: Miss:The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls with reactive strikes against you until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Fault in the Memory
power.fluff: You spin a web of lies that makes someone doubt his or her own recollection

section.name: Check:
section.target: one creature that shares a language with you
section.text: Bluff vs. Passive Insight
The target gains a +5 bonus if it is unfriendly towards you, or a +10 bonus if it is hostile towards you

section.name: Success:
section.text: You make the target either doubt its memory of an event it remembered clearly, or to believe your version of an event it remembered vaguely.

power.title: Haggle
power.fluff: You are a practiced haggler, often able to bring down the price on what you're buying

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You use this power as part of buying a common or uncommon item of your level or lower.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You get a 10% discount on the item's price if it is common, or a 5% discount if it is uncommon.

power.title: Stirring Speech
power.fluff: Reciting your allies' great deeds and talents, you fill them with the confidence they need to win a battle ahead

section.name: Target:
section.target: each ally who listens to you during the rest

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls and saving throws until he or she is bloodied or until the end of the next encounter, whichever comes first.

power.title: Dungeoneer's Guidance
power.fluff: Your dungeoneering skills step in to support an ally

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally within range makes an Acrobatics, Athletics, Dungeoneering, or Perception check in an underground environment; You must see the ally and the ally must be able to hear you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains a +4 power bonus to the triggering check.

power.title: Eyes of the Dark Delver
power.fluff: Long hours of working in dimness allows you to focus your senses for a moment to see in utter darkness

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain blindsight 10 until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Peer Through the Void
power.fluff: You part the veil between worlds, seeing creatures from the Far Realm as they really are

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Peer Through the Void stance.

Until the stance ends, you gain blindsight 3, and aberrant creatures grant combat advantage to you. You take a -2 penalty to attack rolls and Perception checks against anything outside the range of your blindsight.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can end this stance as a free action on your turn, but not on the same turn you entered it.

power.title: Terrain Understanding
power.fluff: You alert your allies to hidden advantages in the nearby terrain, giving them an opportunity to shift the battle and defend themselves

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, and each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, each target gains a +2 power bonus to AC and ignores difficult terrain when shifting.

power.title: Stonecunning
power.fluff: The subterranean world keeps few secrets from you

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You make a Perception check underground

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You use your Dungeoneering check modifier in place of your Perception check modifier for the triggering check.

power.title: Internal Reserves
power.fluff: Summoning up reserves of strength, you make a desperate effort to prevail

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You make a saving throw and dislike the result

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +5 power bonus to the triggering saving throw.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You do not need to be conscious to use this power.

power.title: Third Wind
power.fluff: You have almost endless reserves and can rebound from injuries that wound bring down another

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: Your turn starts and you are bloodied

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You regain the use of your second wind.

power.title: Walk It Off
power.fluff: You take a deep breath to fight off a lingering wound

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: Your turn starts and you are taking ongoing damage

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make a saving throw against the ongoing damage before you take the damage. If you are taking several types of ongoing damage, make a saving throw against each.

power.title: Physician's Care
power.fluff: Your extensive training helps you get an ally back into fighting shape

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must have a healer's kit.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target spends at least 2 healing surges during the rest, he or she regains one healing surge.

power.title: Temporary Inoculation
power.fluff: Your ministrations briefly protect your patient from poison

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must have a healer's kit.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is immune to poison until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Swift Recovery
power.fluff: You address a companion's most critical wounds to get his or her fighting spirit back

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must have a healer's kit.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target uses his or her second wind without spending an action.

power.title: Historical Revelation
power.fluff: When an ally struggles to recall an important fact, you supply a story to nudge him or her onto the right path

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally within range makes a knowledge check and dislikes the result

section.name: Target:
section.target: the triggering ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target rerolls the triggering knowledge check and uses either result.

power.title: Insightful Warning
power.fluff: As your foe unleashes its attack, you realize that you have read about this exact sort of danger and shout a warning to your friends

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A creature you can see makes an attack roll for an area or close attack that includes you as a target

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, and each ally in the burst that is targeted by the triggering attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack.

power.fluff: You hide the core of your identity deep in your subconscious

section.text: You can also use this power as a free interrupt with the following trigger and effect:

section.text: You start your turn and are dominated

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make a saving throw against the dominating effect. If the effect normally allows a saving throw, you gain a +2 power bonus to this save.

power.title: Empathic Read
power.fluff: You sense where the conversation is headed, and stop an ally from making a gaffe

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally within range makes a Bluff check, a Diplomacy check, or an Intimidate check, and dislikes the result

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target rerolls the triggering check and uses either result.

power.title: Insightful Counter
power.fluff: You foresee your opponent's move and deny it the advantage

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you do not grant combat advantage to attackers that you can see.

power.title: Lockstep Maneuver
power.fluff: Your enemy moves, and you match its steps with a countermove

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy within 5 squares of you moves willingly

section.name: Effect:
section.text: For each square the triggering creature moves, you shift 1 square, to a maximum of one-half your speed.

power.title: Demoralize Foe
power.fluff: You spit an ugly threat at your adversary, making it think twice before it attacks you

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an adjacent enemy with an attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Out of My Way
power.fluff: You inspire terror in your enemies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You push each target 1 square, but not into hindering or damaging terrain.

power.title: Scatter the Cowards
power.fluff: The fearsomeness of your presence sends foes slinking away

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move your speed. During this movement, minions cannot attack you, and you can use the following action at-will:

section.name: Free Interrupt:
section.text: Trigger: An enemy misses you with an attack, or you enter a square adjacent to a minion; You push the triggering creature 1 square. You cannot target a given creature more than once with this action during the move.

power.title: Try the Stick
power.fluff: Why waste time with diplomacy when threats can get to the heart of the matter

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You make a Diplomacy check and dislike the result

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You discard your Diplomacy check and make an Intimidate check instead.

power.title: Path of the Bounding Stag
power.fluff: You easily pick a path through the underbrush

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move your speed. During this movement, you ignore difficult terrain that is a result of trees, underbrush, or other natural growth.

power.title: Practiced Rider
power.fluff: So familiar are you with the saddle, you can spring to or from your mount in a flash

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You mount or dismount a willing, adjacent creature that has the Mount keyword.

power.title: Terrain Understanding
power.fluff: You alert your allies to hidden advantages in the nearby terrain, giving them an opportunity to shift the battle and defend themselves

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, and each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, each target gains a +2 power bonus to AC and ignores difficult terrain when shifting.

power.title: Survivalist's Guidance
power.fluff: Your survival skills step in to support an ally

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally within range makes an Acrobatics, Athletics, Nature, or Perception check in a wilderness environment; You must see the ally and the ally must be able to hear you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains a +4 power bonus to the triggering check.

power.title: Foil Ambush
power.fluff: Something out of place alerts you to imminent danger, letting you foil an enemy's ambust

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You are surprised while conscious

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You are not suprised, and are aware of the location of any enemy within 10 squares of you that is hidden.
You shift up to one-half your speed.

power.title: Guided Shot
power.fluff: You spot a critical weakness in a foe's defenses, which an ally can exploit to deadly effect

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally within range misses an attack against AC; The target of the attack must be within 10 squares of you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack is resolved against Reflex instead of AC.

power.title: Trap Sense
power.fluff: The hair in the back of your neck stands up, alerting you to a trap or hazard that was sprung

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A trap or hazard makes an attack roll against you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +4 power bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack.
If the triggering attack misses you, you can shift up to one-half your speed before resolving any effects from the miss.

power.title: Censure the Unholy
power.fluff: Brandishing a holy symbol, you drive undead away and bolster allies against them

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wearing or holding a holy symbol, or another similar item.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 1 until the end of your next turn.
Allies in the aura gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against undead creatures. Also, you can use the following action at-will:

section.name: Opportunity Reaction:
section.text: Trigger: An undead ends its turn in the aura; You push the triggering undead 1 square.

power.title: Deliverance of Faith
power.fluff: You give yourself in the belief that somewhere, something will give a little back

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You spend a healing surge to gain temporary hit points equal to your healing surge value.

power.section: If you have any of these temporary hit points at the end of the encounter, you regain hit points equal to the amount remaining, and then lose them.

power.title: Theologian's Shield
power.fluff: Calling on lore culled from sacred texts, you know how to protect yourself from your enemy's attack

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You are hit by a Necrotic or a Radiant attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you have resist necrotic and resist radiant. Both resists are equal to one-half your level.

power.title: Concealed Shift
power.fluff: Your enemy misjudges your position, giving you a chance to duck out of the way

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy misses you with a melee or ranged attack while you have concealment or cover from it

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift 1 square, or shift 2 squares to a space where you have total concealment or total cover against the triggering enemy.

power.title: Eyes of the Dark Delver
power.fluff: Long hours of working in dimness allows you to focus your senses for a moment to see in utter darkness

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain blindsight 10 until the end of your next turn.

power.title: City Dweller
power.fluff: Your familiarity with cities tells you what will support your weight and helps you perceive things that are out of place

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You would make an Acrobatics check, and Athletics check, or a Perception check in an urban environment

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You use your Streetwise check modifier in place of the triggering skill's check modifier.

power.title: Slow Pursuit
power.fluff: You knock over obstacles, take difficult paths, drop rubbish, and do anything else you can think of to slow your enemies' pursuit

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be in an urban environment.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move your speed. At any point during the movement, you create an area of difficult terrain in a close blast 3. The difficult terrain lasts until the end of the encounter.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can use this power as part of a skill challenge to escape pursuers. If you do, you gain an automatic success, and give the next ally to make a check a +2 bonus to his or her check.

power.title: Hasty Retreat
power.fluff: It dawns on you as you botch the job that now might be a good time to make a swift exit

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: Your disarm attempt triggers a trap

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift a number of squares equal to one-half your Dexterity modifier.

power.title: Quick Switch
power.fluff: You pull your friend closer and then slip away

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You slide the target 1 square into your space, and then shift 1 square.
